name: Slideshow
description: Show photos you made with your phone to friends you invited.
Launch this board on a device with a big screen, a TV for example.
Scan the QR code on the bottom with the phone and inject photos you want to show from there.
Once you see photos arriving, make sure to switch the canvas service into fullscreen by double clicking
